title: Update patch 6.17 fails
body:
My patch update to patch 6.17 is failing and it says "Unknown error has ocurred. Please check the logs for more information" and when i close the window the patcher is not scanning any filles.
Any type of help would be apreciated thx :D


Edit: HI guys!
I just came here to say that i was having this problem in a small patch that was up before the patch 6.17.
When the patch 6.17 got released i wasnt having this problem anymore :D

replies.body:
Hey peeps,

We've been getting an increasing number of reports around patching 6.17 fails and are already investigating as of this post. **A current workaround is to hit the *continue* button to dismiss the error message, which will allow you to continue to launch normally.**

Updates on this issue are being posted to our [live incident breakdown post](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/live-incident-breakdown-na/9GYNI2JK-aug-23-patching-errors-for-a-patch-we-havent-released-yet). We appreciate your patience as we send out Heimerdinger and his best hextechnicians to work on this.
There is no continue button.. It say's retry and when you click it 2 seconds later the same window pops up..

Hey Targons Blade,

That's nice of you to give us a live incident breakdown post...also just wanted to say i feel really dumb after writing a long A** replay to Porocles with error's and staff from the logs. LMAO.

With Regards
MorbiusV.

Hey MorbiusV,

Although the issue has been resolved, we're still not sure why this error only manifested for some players. We have a few leads but need your help! 

Please help us out by answering the following 2 questions :)
_I made sure to list some steps but let me know if you need assistance! 
_

*** When was the last time you ran Windows Update?**

1. You can see this by going to **Start**, then type **Windows Update** and press**Enter**
2. Then on the left click on **View Update History** and on the far right you'll see the column **Date Installed**
3. What is the date listed at the very top of **Date Installed**?

*** Is automatic root certificate update turned off?**

_You can see this by doing the following:_

1. Click **Start**, and then type **Run **and press enter.
2. In run type **gpedit.msc** and then click **OK**.
3. If the User Account Control dialog box appears, confirm that the action it displays is what you want, and then click **Continue**.
4. Under **computer configuration**, Double-click **Administrative Templates**, double-click **System**, double-click **Internet Communication Management**, and then click **Internet Communication settings**.
5. Double-click **Turn off Automatic Root Certificates Update**.
6. At the top left you'll see **Not Configured**, **Enabled ** and **Disabled**. Which one is selected?

Hello LiL Batman,

I just got the notification about your answer,LOL...

Its Fine i could play after some hours,it (the problem) was the Windows 10 Anniversary Update.
Yes, as someone said there is no continue button

I've tried all of the solutions posted here as well as some other solutions posted for similar previous problems as well as completely reinstalling the game to no avail. I'm literally sitting next to someone whom I was playing with last night. And they've had no problems updating and getting back on the game.
same problem here.. it seems like it doesnt even try to update just an instant error
i got the same problem here :s cant do shit ,,, i tried to re install and nothing happend {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
6.17 is not currently live, but there was a small patch last night which is what may have been updating.  If you hit Okay instead of Retry, you should be good to login.  Let me know!

Hi Porocles.
I dont find the okay button but if ur talking about the X to close the window, i already done that and it doesnt scann files
And idk if this is normal but if the patch is not currently live why does it show me the patch notes?

Thanks for the info!  We usually try and have patch notes available before it goes live.  There was a minor patch last night, which might be what you're updating to.  At what percent exactly on the patcher are you getting this error?
It doesnt get stuck at any percentage because it tells you that it is scanning files which gets stuck at 1 (for me at least)
yes, same here
same thing is happening to me
It gets stuck at 1 file scanned doesnt even go to a percentage

Thanks!  I'd like to go over some normal troubleshooting and see what happens!  Generally, at this point in the patcher stage (0%), the patcher needs to get permission to proceed.  Go over ouer [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure access is being allowed.  Let me know your results!

Just finished going through this list as well. Still getting an error report at 0%. I was playing just fine last night (11 hours ago my time NZ) after your afore mentioned small patch. Woke up this morning (2 hours ago) to what I know to be 6.17, as I am sitting next to someone who had no issues playing it.
Is it 0% or 1 file scanned
Both?
Oh yea true that mb

Okay so here is what I have got,
Windows is all up to date, still got the error.
Disable UAC- still does not let me update.
Run the game as administrator does not change a thing.
There are no errors in my hard drive.
Reinstall the game as administrator- I honestly have not tried this since I think this is not the issue, although if it is I guess ill find out later.

Sincerely
I have tried every one of those steps aswell. Still getting the error though.

Do u think that the problem can be from updating my windows to his newest version
PS: in the patch 6.16 i was not getting any issue

Hello Porocles,

Same problem here,i tried everything ,except reinstall cause that would take me a long time and i think that's not the issue with error that we receive...so i would like to help as much as i can so here some screenshots and informations from the logs :

I hope i helped someway or another and sorry that i posted this all here,but we want to play and you want to find the problem,but no one from the Summoners posted the Logs,and Nobody from your side of the Team asked for them,that's the reason i did this long A** reply to you.

With Regards

MorbiusV.

I get stuck at 33%, but then again, whenever I update, it always goes straight to 33% then to 99% then done.
This time it goes straight to 33% then gives me the error message. No continue button in sight.

It shows the patch notes by default.
Patch 6.17 is coming at 03:00 Pacific time (10:00 UTC) time when the servers will shut down and will be prepared for patch 6.17. Then after approximately 3 hours the game will be back up with the new patch.

I still have this problem, on both my NA and EUW account. My nephew, who's been here since yesterday and whom I played with last night without problems, easily did the patch and is now playing... Rito pls.
They say its supposed to be fixed for na but it still isnt working

Same problem , as soon as i start the launcher i get the direct error message. 
I also tried many of the solutions such as,
Repair LoL, Disable Firewall, Disable Antivirus, Reinstall Game, Delete Solutions and Download folder in RADS and a few other suggestions but still no luck.
Anyone have any ideas. Riot? Support? One Punch Man?? anyone?

Edit : I am also seeing that EUNE will be unavailable so that must be the problem. Lets wait the said time which is 12 hours and see what happens. Peace and Love whoop whoop.

Hey TuneDown,

Although the issue has been resolved, we're still not sure why this error only manifested for some players. We have a few leads but need your help! 

Please help us out by answering the following 2 questions :)
_I made sure to list some steps but let me know if you need assistance! 
_

*** When was the last time you ran Windows Update?**

1. You can see this by going to **Start**, then type **Windows Update** and press**Enter**
2. Then on the left click on **View Update History** and on the far right you'll see the column **Date Installed**
3. What is the date listed at the very top of **Date Installed**?

*** Is automatic root certificate update turned off?**

_You can see this by doing the following:_

1. Click **Start**, and then type **Run **and press enter.
2. In run type **gpedit.msc** and then click **OK**.
3. If the User Account Control dialog box appears, confirm that the action it displays is what you want, and then click **Continue**.
4. Under **computer configuration**, Double-click **Administrative Templates**, double-click **System**, double-click **Internet Communication Management**, and then click **Internet Communication settings**.
5. Double-click **Turn off Automatic Root Certificates Update**.
6. At the top left you'll see **Not Configured**, **Enabled ** and **Disabled**. Which one is selected?

So if the Anniversary Update from Windows 10 has already been installed in your PC for longer than ten days... meaning that you can't reinstall an older update.... means I can't play the game anymore? 

Are there any other options to fix this problem?
I always get bugsplat and the patch just stops... now I have this issue for days
Hey guys..so i was having this same problem, I undid the last windows update and my league is now working like normal.

none was selected just "not configured", what next?

I'm currently having problems with the current patch as well. I experiencing the issue where the launcher will sit at 1 file scanned, 0%, and after a few moments the "Unspecified error" message will pop up.

I have researched extensively to try and find a solution. I have been through every suggestion on the help forums, I have disabled any firewall/antivirus I have, reset my ISP/DNS/modem, disabled UAC, tried the repair option, the Hextech repair tool, clean installation, heck, I have even messed around with my Windows updates to see if that was causing the issue. From what I have been able to research, something with the latest Windows 10 update seems to be interfering? I have tried countless things to try and fix this issue, or even make some headway, but no matter what I attempt, I'm always left with my launcher displaying the "Unspecified Error" message, usually followed not long after by a bugsplat error.

I opened a ticket over a day ago, and have heard no response or anything on the matter, and I'm rather frustrated. If there is an issue, I can understand, but being left in the dark is what is infuriating. Not to mention a different post claimed that this issue was 100% resolved in NA, yet I continue to experience the issue. I have no idea what to do or what to try anymore.

Rito .. 
My game was fine in 6.16 .. after 6.17 released i updated my game 3 times and everytime the patch stops or error occur .
i reinstalled the game and the patch finally finished but now the game stuck in the loading to the in-game !!!!
i pick a champion and when the game goes to the loading before the in-game it stops and game crashes ...
sometimes i manage to go in-game but after a few seconds i get the "attempting to reconnect" msg and the game does not come back again and if i closed it and reconnect it wont even go to the loading and just a black screen ..
plz help RITO !!

Hi guys, had the same problem...If you're on windows 10 and recently got the anniversary update.. try uninstalling it. I tried everything including reinstalling the game completelly and that's the only thing that cut it.

Hey Elrafa7,

Although the issue has been resolved, we're still not sure why this error only manifested for some players. We have a few leads but need your help! 

Please help us out by answering the following 2 questions :)
_I made sure to list some steps but let me know if you need assistance!

*** When was the last time you ran Windows Update?**

*** Is automatic root certificate update turned off?**

_You can see this by doing the following:_

That anniversary update is a real nightmare :D No Wi-Fi on my laptop,could not get into settings and many more problems,lel.

Hello!
Got it running now after allowing all LoL executables I could find trough Windows firewall.Not sure if it is cause of that or Riot made any changes but it is up and running now.
Good luck!

Same problem,also had that big windows update.Tried everything,reinstalled,swithed off all antivirus and firewalls,still nothing.
Help please

I have no idea if this has anything to do with the issue but Windows 10 had an update today and i have only had issues since the windows update. I have at the same time been having issues with LoL since 6.16 and a couple of my friends i play with have also been having issues since 6.16.
It gets stuck at 1 file scanned doesnt even go to a percentage, hlp plzz {{item:3070}}
Same issue occurred
I have got the same problem. Tried everything, by everything i mean every step and troubleshooting by Riot.
I've got the same problem, i've done everything from the link that wizard pasted and nothing happened.

Greetings Summoner!
Check [this](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/qGY56UB4-comprehensive-troubleshooting-your-patching-issues) out, it might help you resolve your problems.
